content.raw:
weird, there was a flaky failure of `INTEGRATION_recorder` on brew:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=402)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/402/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/402/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_recorder/test_ran/

~~~
75: [ RUN      ] recorder.BeginRecordingTopicsBeforeAdvertisement
75: Chirping [100] times on [2] topics:
75:  -- /foo
75:  -- /bar
75: [       OK ] recorder.BeginRecordingTopicsBeforeAdvertisement (3518 ms)
75: [ RUN      ] recorder.BeginRecordingTopicsAfterAdvertisement
75: libc++abi.dylib: terminating with uncaught exception of type std::__1::bad_function_call: std::exception
75: Chirping [1500] times on [2] topics:
75:  -- /foo
75:  -- /bar
75/82 Test #75: INTEGRATION_recorder .......................................***Exception: Child aborted  6.79 sec
~~~

but it passed on the next try: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/403/testReport/(root)/recorder/
